name: Raphael
temple_description:
Raphael, the famous archangel, was a Dominion of the second Sphere, the monarch of the Angels of Virtues, the guardian of the life Tree in the Garden of Eden, and one of the seven angels before the throne of God.
She exercised all the miracles of healing. In addition to curing people's sufferings, she also taught the knowledge and skills of building the ark to Noah's family.

active_skills.name: Light Heal
active_skills.targets: 3 angels of our team with the lowest HP percentage

active_skills.name: Seraph
active_skills.effect: Enter [Excite] state, increases DEF by 60% and ATK by 18% for 3 rounds
